column1: Mafra was born and spent his early childhood in the Brazilian city of Santo André and began training in mixed martial arts as a teenager.
Mafra later moved to Balneário Camboriú and made his professional debut in the Welterweight division in early 2011. He compiled a record of 6-0 competing for regional promotions in his native Brazil
column2: before auditioning for The Ultimate Fighter.
